Articles.Content:
Ok, so I\'ve built a mod version of the same ship that has tons of juice and can get you anywhere you want to be in the Kerbal universe but I\'ve been working on a stock version now and all I can do is get the saucer section into orbit (this means ejecting the nacels and body once the fuel runs out). I\'d like to get the whole thing into orbit but anything I add makes her launch unstable. I\'ve attached the craft file here and maybe someone can figure a delivery vehicle to get more out of her. The reason I want a stock version is so that it will stand the test of time through all the updates. The biggest challenge is that the stock version is a lot heavier than its mod counterpart and uses most of its fuel getting to altitude.

update: I\'ve added the mod version as requested ;D You will need novapunch remix, c7 and the c7 experimental packs. You can do a lot with this one and I love the look of the C7 experimental parts. Novapunch is used for the delivery vehicle.

DD, please don\'t promote your shit in others threads. It\'s rude.

Anyway, nice enterprise! Any chance of you posting the mod version?
You got it! added it up top.
where is the link for the saucer
gregroxmun please do not necro threads, if you look you can see the last post was over 3 months ago
